officialTitle: Evaluation of a Pharmacogenetic-based Warfarin Dosing Algorithm in Patients With Low Time in Therapeutic Range - Study Design
inclusionCriteria:
* Only patients with atrial fibrillation, above 18 years, and with TTR \<50% based on the last three values of INR will be included in this study.
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria: * Patients will not be included if they have reached a stable dose of warfarin, liver dysfunction, alcoholism, use of another anticoagulant, use of chemotherapy, or if they do not meet the inclusion criteria
